name: Adventures in Nave He
description:
Title: Adventures in Nave He
Platform: Browser
Genre: Medieval Fantasy
Rating: E
Target Market: casual gamers
Game Overview: Adventures in Nave He is a fantasy game. After a traumatic explosion occurs, Henry finds himself in a mysterious far away land, where he meets two of his friends and must go on a quest for the king, who promises to send them home.

Instructions: Press play above.
Design Team: Ethan Gibson -- Game Designer
